snippet: The top nine teams in Nascar formed the Race Team Alliance to collaborate on issues facing the sport. The group’s goals include lowering costs.
abstract: Nascar's top nine teams form alliance to collaborate on issues facing sport of auto racing.
lead_paragraph: The top nine teams in Nascar formed the Race Team Alliance to collaborate on issues facing the sport. The group’s goals include lowering costs.

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
